Name: AI Battle Royale Generator
About the game: Generate your own Battle Royale simulations filled with Artificial Intelligences trained using machine learning ! There is 4 official maps and you can generate more than 100 million unique maps ! You can also create your own maps with the level editor ! The Streamer Mode This mode will let your Twitch.tv viewers join the battle by typing 'play' in the chat ! This will create an AI with their name and their chosen skin ! Each viewers have their own AI and are able to fight in the Battle Royale battle ! You are a small streamer ? No worries! You can change the number of AI per viewer ! From 1 to 6! The Normal Mode In this mode you can create and control your own IA ! Level up & improve your AI by winning matches and killing other IA's! You can also change the appearance of your AI by opening free loot boxes you get as you level up! UP TO 500 VIEWERS CAN JOIN THE MATCH ! WHO WILL BE THE LAST SURVIVOR ?
